text:
Umbayee (ഉമ്പായി; 1952 – 1 August 2018) was an Indian folk musician and composer. He worked with the Ghazal genre. Umbayee was born in Mattancherry, Kerala. Umbayee was known for his unique style of singing. He was known for his songs: "Hrudayaraagam", "Mehboob", and "Gazalmaala".
Umbayee died on 1 August 2018 in Aluva, Kerala from stomach cancer at the age of 66.
